module.name: Class of Service
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE, REQUIRES A LICENSE. Class of Service allows you to limit access, per extension, to feature codes, trunks, queues, ring groups, etc.
module.changelog: *2.11.9* Fix HA DB connectivity problems, and fix ampersand in CoS name causing issues *2.11.8* Sales Cleanup *2.11.7* Add Time Condition and Day/Night Toggle support. *2.11.4* CSS Fix backport from 12. *2.11.3* Change Feature Codes to display name *2.11.2* Initial Release
